abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column examines excellent performance by Americans Dustin Johnson and Jordan Spieth in first round of the British Open; observes that Johnson's powerful yet accurate drives have allowed him to take top position, while Spieth has ascended by means of precision putting.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth, who is trying to become the first golfer since Ben Hogan in 1953 to win the year’s first three majors, was two strokes off the early pace set by Dustin Johnson.

headline.main: British Open 2015: Jordan Spieth and Dustin Johnson Bring the Old Course to Its Knees
headline.print_headline: Bringing the Old Course to Its Knees

snippet: Jordan Spieth, who is trying to become the first golfer since Ben Hogan in 1953 to win the year’s first three majors, was two strokes off the early pace set by Dustin Johnson.
